desc: Go Bags and Survival Backpacks Kits. Be Ready Bags are packed with must-have Go Bag contents needed to survive a disaster. Contains food and water rations to last 72-hours during an emergency. Survival Kits has extra space for your own personal items. Free shipping.

layout.text:
Everything You Need To Be Prepared . . .
When Disaster Strikes!
Do You Have Your Go Bag Ready?
